img_above_text:
![Wukong Longevity 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e9/Wukong_Longevity_10.jpg)
The lower path will lead past another Crow Diviner, and up some stairs to an area with several stone monuments where the path diverges.
img_below_text:
A glowing pot can be seen on a small wooden platform, but guarding it is a new formidable opponent. The strangely named Turtle Treasure is a stout skull-faced yaoguai with a large mace it can use to swing in wide arcs or slams, and can also thrust out its belly at you like the Frog Guai bosses, or leap into the air for a butt slam.
![Wukong Longevity 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/4f/Wukong_Longevity_12.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 107 from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Longevity 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e9/Wukong_Longevity_10.jpg)
The lower path will lead past another Crow Diviner, and up some stairs to an area with several stone monuments where the path diverges."
            - Following Text: "A glowing pot can be seen on a small wooden platform, but guarding it is a new formidable opponent. The strangely named Turtle Treasure is a stout skull-faced yaoguai with a large mace it can use to swing in wide arcs or slams, and can also thrust out its belly at you like the Frog Guai bosses, or leap into the air for a butt slam.
![Wukong Longevity 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/4f/Wukong_Longevity_12.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player character is approaching a glowing pot on a small wooden platform in a snowy forest area. The pot is guarded by a new formidable opponent, the Turtle Treasure, a stout, skull-faced yaoguai wielding a large mace. The image serves to illustrate the challenging encounter the player will face in this part of the game, highlighting the environment and the enemy's presence.
